main event: A private citizen reported observing an unidentified flying object near Reliance, Wyoming on 12 May 1968.
interesting points: The object was oval in shape and approximately 30 feet in diameter,The object emitted a bright reddish-orange glow,The object hovered for several minutes before accelerating straight up at a very high rate of speed,The United States Air Force conducted an investigation but found no evidence to substantiate the report,The incident remains classified as 'Unidentified'.
